Klugscheißerism.text: ||creature|| correct ||Enemy||. ||Enemy|| gets angry. ||Enemy||'s attack increases, defense decreases.

Confulizzle.text: ||creature|| confuses her enemy. ||Enemy|| gets confuses. ||Enemy|| attacks himself, ||Enemy||'s attack increases.

throw-a-table.text: ||creature|| builds a table an throw it at the enemy.

Jump-Kick.text: ||creature|| jumps and kicks ||Enemy|| in the face.

Rainbow-Poop.text: A Rainbow appears. ||creature||'s hp increases. ||Enemy||'s defens decreases

Easter-Egg-Attack.text: ||creature|| hides an egg. ||Enemy|| search it ||Enemy||'s defense decreases
